content: Hello, I somehow turned off the details provided for the suggestions in ctrl + space interface. With details I mean the text bubble next to each suggestion explaining the suggestion. How may I turn it back on?
I tried that, didn't work originally. Although the problem is somehow solved after rebooting. Thanks for the answer.
Baran Zadeoglu has marked this topic as resolved.
Baran Zadeoglu has marked this topic as unresolved.

I somehow managed to replicate this again. As seen from the screenshot, the details are missing. Ctrl + space does not switch them on. Normally even in the more compact form, the details are succinctly present on the same line with gray font. They are turned off as well.

Screenshot-from-2024-01-10-20-59-04.png
it appears the lack of "apply" is causing that. My bad.
Baran Zadeoglu has marked this topic as resolved.
